name: Arleil Schous
Lore: 'One of the Rebellion''s main contacts on Tatooine. Widely regarded as a leader in the Mos Eisley alien community. Aging male Defel. Has lost the ability to warp light.',
Text: 'When deployed, you may take one non-unique alien into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Your aliens deploy -1 to same or adjacent Tatooine site.',
